Exploring Areas of Value CreationThis is a Problems question, and it could lead to a discussion of ways you could help address some challenges. As a trusted advisor, however, you need to fully explore the practice’s desired outcomes for efficiency and patient satisfaction, and their strategies for achieving them.

The best question to ask now is, "What other options do you see for simultaneously increasing patient satisfaction and the efficiency of your office?"

This is an Options question that continues to explore ways to align with the customer and build the value of your product.

Here is how Rachel would have answered that question:

"We’re placing more rigor around the processes we follow in the office. We are loosening up the schedule so that it is easier to get earlier or same-day appointments, when needed. All patient calls are to be returned within an hour. Patients are not to wait more than fifteen minutes after their scheduled appointment time prior to seeing their doctor. We did a good job on all these before, but putting a metric in place has really helped us be more thoughtful about our actions."
